items.title: Comcast reports earnings before the bell — here's what to expect
items.content: Wall Street will be paying attention to Comcast's broadband, streaming and theme park businesses, as well as progress of the spinout of its cable TV networks.

items.title: Trump and Musk called for former Starliner astronauts to return 'as soon as possible.' Here's what NASA planned.
items.content: NASA previously planned to return Wilmore and Williams as part of a crew returning in late March, using SpaceX's Dragon spacecraft that has been at the ISS for months.
items.contentSnippet: NASA previously planned to return Wilmore and Williams as part of a crew returning in late March, using SpaceX's Dragon spacecraft that has been at the ISS for months.

items.title: Levi beats earnings estimates but expects pressure this year from strong U.S. dollar
items.content: Levi expects its sales to slow in the current fiscal year because of the strong U.S. dollar and one fewer selling week.

items.title: Frontier Airlines proposes merging with bankrupt Spirit — again. Spirit says no

items.title: Super Bowl ads beckon up to $8 million apiece for Fox
items.content: Fox has sold out of ad spots for the Super Bowl on Feb. 9, with more than 10 commercials selling for a record $8 million, according to a person familiar.

items.title: Starbucks earnings top estimates, but same-store sales decline for fourth straight quarter
items.content: Starbucks said its same-store sales fell 4%, fueled by a 6% decline in visits to its stores.

items.title: FDA approves Novo Nordisk's Ozempic to treat chronic kidney disease in those with diabetes, expanding its use
items.content: Expanded Ozempic approval in the U.S. could transform how doctors treat patients with chronic kidney disease, which involves a gradual loss of kidney function.

items.title: Elon Musk's X begins its push into financial services with Visa deal
